aboutMe.text:
Full-stack engineer graduated from a French engineering school and who had completed a semester at KAIST. I am well-versed in a wide range of frontend technologies (major SPA frameworks) and backend technologies (Node.js/Nest.js/Hapi.js, Java/Spring). I also had the opportunity to work on other technologies during my internships in major French multinationals or my studies (Android, Kotlin).
Passionate about technology, I was also able to learn in autonomy the principles of application design, lean management or clean architecture

kaist.title: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
kaist.subtitle: Exchange Semester

courses.course2: CS442 : Mobile computing, applications and networking
